ctx: intros y x z H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: apply (star_ind X R (fun x z => plus R x z)).
exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type R : relation X y, x, z : X H1 : plus R x y H2 : star R y z The term "X" has type "Type" while it is expected to have type "?X -> ?X -> Prop".

ctx: intros y x z H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type R : relation X y, x, z : X H1 : plus R x y H2 : star R y z Unable to unify "star R ?M1516 ?M1517" with "exists2 y : X, R x y & star R y z".

ctx: intros y x z H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type R : relation X y, x, z : X H1 : plus R x y H2 : star R y z Unable to unify "plus R x y" with "plus R x z".

ctx: intros y x z H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type R : relation X y, x, z : X H1 : plus R x y H2 : star R y z Unable to unify "star R y z" with "plus R x z".

original: intros y x z H1 H2. apply (star_ind X R (fun x z => plus R x z)). - apply plus_star. - apply H1. - apply H2.
